title: Large-Scale English for Academic Purposes (EAP) & Academic Literacy Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary comprehension, general academic reading/writing experience
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment where students from diverse academic fields aim to acquire academic English and literacy skills, combining online materials with face-to-face sessions.

learning_goals: They can communicate using 3,000 general vocabulary words and 750 academic vocabulary words in scholarly contexts
They can analyze and critically summarize core themes of academic papers and lecture materials
They can convey their opinions with clear pronunciation and appropriate expressions during academic presentations and discussions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
